entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
